commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<template>
  <apexchart
    type="bar"
    height="400"
    :options="options"
    :series="options.series"
  />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'BarChart',
  props: ['workouts', 'orientation'],
  data() {
    return {
      options: {
        series: [
          {
            name: 'Workouts',
            data: this.workouts.map(workout => {
              return {
                x: workout.date.substring(8, 10),
                y: workout.steps,
              };
            }),
          },
        ],
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
